about_the_game:
Remnants of Flesh is a top-down survival horror game with action elements, focusing on the aftermath of an outbreak, and how the citizens of Oakley City react to it.

  • Open World Exploration: Navigate the streets, the underground, and the abandoned buildings of Oakley City.
  • Dynamic Combat System: Engage in battles against cultists and creatures with a unique, timing based combat system.
  • Mission-Based Gameplay: Accept missions from survivors, and earn rewards to aid your own survival.
  • Top-down Perspective: Experience the horror from a top-down view alongside a dark synthwave soundtrack.
  • Survival Horror Mechanics: Scavenge for resources and face your fears in intense combat scenarios.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of drug use, mild gore and violence.
